content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is very nice and I think a good price would be 850 euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I consider your offer too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an even worse offer. I'm looking for a higher price. Try again.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better, but I still think you can do better. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still not enough. This apartment is in high demand. You'll need to offer more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's aim higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
